<<<<<<< HEAD
A new prognostication for the year of our Lord, 1691. Being the third year after bissextile or leap-year, and from the creation of the world, 5640. Exactly calculated according to art, for the meridian of the most famous city of Edinburgh, whose latitude is 55 d. 54 m.¹/₂. and longitude is 11 d. 37 m. / By G. S. Philomath. G. S., philomath, fl. 1691.
[28] p.
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the City and Colledge, Edinburgh : for the year 1691.
Blank leaves interleaved with text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======

Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the City and Colledge, Edinburgh : for the year 1691.
